definition: everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary

sentences.english: Some selfish Chinese politicians are considered to be "typhoid Marys " to their own people.
sentences.chinese: 一些自私自利的中國政客，是自己同胞禍害的根源。

sentences.english: Students who already have on-campus housing arranged may not seek off-campus accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 已安排校內住宿者，不得私自在校外租房住宿。

sentences.english: Scampish software and postern trojan, privately installs a lot of scampish software for the user.
sentences.chinese: 流氓軟件與後門木馬，私自爲用戶安裝很多流氓軟件。

sentences.english: May I not be selfish and self-possessive, but selfless and disinterested.
sentences.chinese: 願我不自私自利，而是公正無私。

sentences.english: The land use after farmland readjustment without approval.
sentences.chinese: 一未經許可，私自變更重劃農地之使用者。

sentences.english: They are busy carrying food, but the ant colony and egoistic.
sentences.chinese: 它們忙着搬食物，但蟻羣裏也有自私自利的傢伙。

sentences.english: You should reject this self-serving sympathy ploy.
sentences.chinese: 您應該拒絕這種自私自利的手段。

sentences.english: We see Yu Xianyang Lao Jia command, it will not allow unauthorized action.
sentences.chinese: 命令賈老道務必看住俞顯揚，絕不允許其私自行動。

sentences.english: The area was forbidden for people to enter as there are a lot of wild dragons, " Harum said."
sentences.chinese: 但是該地區由於許多野龍出沒並不允許人們私自闖入。

sentences.english: He is such a big thing three dare to liu in charge.
sentences.chinese: 他氣的是這麼大的事劉三竟敢私自作主。

sentences.english: Adam is clever enough, but he s also something of an egomaniac.
sentences.chinese: 亞當足夠聰明，但是他也有點自私自利。

sentences.english: His imprisonment was personally ordered by Madame Mao.
sentences.chinese: 毛的夫人私自下令將他入獄。

sentences.english: Indeed, everyone knows it is utterly false and self-serving only.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，每個人都知道這是完全錯誤並且自私自利的。

sentences.english: One who is selfish is contemptible .
sentences.chinese: 自私自利的人是可鄙的。

sentences.english: Economize on water and electricity use. Attention on fireproofing. Do not wire the apartment or repair the electricity switch without permission.
sentences.chinese: 不準私自接電源或檢修電器開關，以防止觸電事故。

sentences.english: If you hoard things for yourself, your parents' hearts will be grieved.
sentences.chinese: 如果私自藏起，就傷害了父母的心意。

definition: not having undergone/without (having gone though a certain process)
must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
